verses.name: Numbers 32:14
verses.text: And, behold, ye are risen up in your fathers’ stead, an increase of sinful men, to augment yet the fierce anger of the Lord toward Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 32:15
verses.text: For if ye turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the wilderness; and ye shall destroy all this people.

verses.name: Numbers 32:16
verses.text: And they came near unto him, and said, We will build sheepfolds here for our cattle, and cities for our little ones:
